title: Ownership Structure of Regulus Therapeutics Inc

content.text: As of the latest filing, institutional investors hold approximately 50.3% of Regulus Therapeutics Inc stock. This indicates that a significant portion of the company is owned by institutional entities such as mutual funds, pension funds, and other investment firms.
Among the major shareholders of Regulus Therapeutics Inc are:

Baillie Gifford & Co is a prominent investment management firm and one of the largest shareholders of Regulus Therapeutics Inc. They hold a significant stake in the company, indicating their confidence in its prospects.

BlackRock, Inc. is another major shareholder of Regulus Therapeutics Inc. As one of the world's largest investment management companies, their ownership suggests their belief in the company's potential for growth.

Baker Brothers Advisors LP, a healthcare-focused investment firm, also holds a notable stake in Regulus Therapeutics Inc. Their expertise in the healthcare sector aligns with the company's focus on developing innovative therapies.
Insider ownership refers to the shares of a company owned by its executives, directors, and officers. As of the latest filing, insiders hold approximately 0.8% of Regulus Therapeutics Inc stock.

Regulus Therapeutics Inc has a significant institutional investor presence, indicating confidence in the company's potential. Major shareholders include Baillie Gifford & Co, BlackRock, Inc., and Baker Brothers Advisors LP. Insider ownership is relatively low at around 0.8%.
